import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Orders.css'; const Orders = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('ACTIVE_ORDERS'); const [selectedOrder, setSelectedOrder] = useState(null); const [showTrackingModal, setShowTrackingModal] = useState(false); const activeOrders = [ { orderId: 'ORD-2024-001', medicine: 'NOW Foods, Vitamin D-3', quantity: 500, orderDate: '2024-02-15', expectedDelivery: '2024-03-01', status: 'In Transit', trackingStages: [ { stage: 'Order Placed', date: '2024-02-15', completed: true }, { stage: 'Processing', date: '2024-02-16', completed: true }, { stage: 'In Transit', date: '2024-02-18', completed: true }, { stage: 'Out for Delivery', date: null, completed: false }, { stage: 'Delivered', date: null, completed: false } ] }, // ... more active orders ]; const orderHistory = [ { orderId: 'ORD-2023-095', medicine: 'Amoxicillin', quantity: 200, orderDate: '2023-12-15', deliveryDate: '2023-12-28', status: 'Delivered' }, // ... more historical orders ]; const aiPredictions = [ { id: 1, medicine: 'Flu Vaccine', suggestedQuantity: 1000, reason: 'Upcoming flu season (Winter 2024)', confidence: 85, trend: 'increasing', seasonalFactor: 'Winter season approaching' }, { id: 2, medicine: 'Anti-allergens', suggestedQuantity: 500, reason: 'Spring allergies expected', confidence: 78, trend: 'stable', seasonalFactor: 'Spring pollen forecast' }, // ... more predictions ]; const TrackingModal = ({ order, onClose }) => (
e.stopPropagation()}>

Order Tracking

Order ID: {order.orderId}
Medicine: {order.medicine}
Expected Delivery: {order.expectedDelivery}
{order.trackingStages.map((stage, index) => (

{stage.stage}

{stage.date &&

{stage.date}

}
))}
); return (

Orders & Predictions

{activeTab === 'ACTIVE_ORDERS' && ( {activeOrders.map(order => ( ))}
Order ID Medicine Quantity Order Date Expected Delivery Status Actions
{order.orderId} {order.medicine} {order.quantity} {order.orderDate} {order.expectedDelivery} {order.status}
)} {activeTab === 'ORDER_HISTORY' && ( {orderHistory.map(order => ( ))}
Order ID Medicine Quantity Order Date Delivery Date Status
{order.orderId} {order.medicine} {order.quantity} {order.orderDate} {order.deliveryDate} {order.status}
)} {activeTab === 'AI_PREDICTIONS' && (
{aiPredictions.map(prediction => (

{prediction.medicine}

{prediction.confidence}% confidence

Suggested Order: {prediction.suggestedQuantity} units

{prediction.reason}

{prediction.trend === 'increasing' ? '↑' : '→'} {prediction.seasonalFactor}
))}
)}
{showTrackingModal && selectedOrder && ( setShowTrackingModal(false)} /> )}
); }; export default Orders;
